about_the_game:
Welcome to ALW

The most intense, high energy and badly managed UK indie wrestling promotion. Your newly hired manager has planned for you to be their new top star! The way to do that? Conquer every event around the country and make your way to the biggest UK wrestling pay-per-view, ‘Ladderversary’.

Action after the bell!

The fight that happened in the ring was nothing… after the bell is a different story. It seems that the locker room is not a massive fan of you coming in and taking the main event spots. You need to fight luchadors, big meaty men, brawlers and hardcore legends using a range of weapons from baseball bats to bowling balls to rubber chickens. Hit the wrestlers or to cause an earlier retirement throw your weapon full pelt at them.


Improve your out-of-ring knowledge

Unlock more weapons to defend yourself from the backstage brawlers by collecting special objects in each level. Weapons like the whoopie cushion, fan signs and even a bottle of baby oil that can slip up frustrated wrestlers.

The locations

He might talk the talk but your manager may have got confused on some of these events. Fight in shopping centres, high schools, piers, trains and more absurd locations based on real-life towns in the UK like Harwich, Grimsby and more! Remember every territory comes with a local legend to battle...


You want more?!?

Complete the story mode? Got the highest times on the leaderboard? Had a five-star classic backstage at every event? Collected all the additional weapons? Defeated every local legend? Made it through rumble mode?

We better put you in the Hall Of Legends!

name: Wrestler Rush

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 9700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: -
  • VR Support: -
  • Additional Notes: -

short_description: Wrestler Rush is a first-person, chair-throwing, backstage wrestling, kerfuffle where you concuss wrestlers backstage with an array of weapons from chairs to bowling balls across the UK wrestling independent scene!
